dt.t: it so {wi}happens{/wi} I'm going your way

dt: {bc}to come into being or occur as an event, process, or result
{bc}to do, encounter, or attain something by or as if by chance
{bc}to meet or discover something by chance
{bc}to come or go casually {bc}make a chance appearance

dt.t: he might {wi}happen{/wi} by at any time

dt: {bc}to come especially by way of injury or harm

dt.t: I promise nothing will {wi}happen{/wi} to you

shortdef: to occur by chance —often used with it
to come into being or occur as an event, process, or result
to do, encounter, or attain something by or as if by chance

dt: used to introduce something that is true by chance

dt.t: {it}As it happens{/it}, I know his brother.

shortdef: —used to introduce something that is true by chance

dt: used to describe something that occurs by chance

dt.t: {it}It (just) so happens that{/it} I know her son.

shortdef: —used to describe something that occurs by chance

dt: used to say that bad things happen as part of life and cannot be prevented

shortdef: —used to say that bad things happen as part of life and cannot be prevented

dt.t: She {it}happened into{/it} the room just as the music started.

dt: {bc}to affect or involve (someone or something) as the result of an event or action

dt.t: An odd thing {it}happened to{/it} me on my way to the office last week.
I wonder what/whatever {it}happened to{/it} that guy after he lost his job.

dt: {bc}to affect (someone or something) in a bad or harmful way

dt.t: I promise nothing will {it}happen to{/it} you.
What {it}happened to{/it} the car? There's a big scratch on the fender.

shortdef: to affect or involve (someone or something) as the result of an event or action; especially : to affect (someone or something) in a bad or harmful way
